description.value:
Prerequisite: Earth Genasi, Fire Genasi, Water Genasi

You are the embodiment of multiple elements blending together. You gain Resistance to Lightning damage. You also know the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplShockingGr]{Shocking Grasp} cantrip, and starting at 3rd level, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFeatherFal]{Feather Fall } spell with this bullet once per Long Rest. Once you cast Feather Fall using this bullet, you can cast it again using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this species).

These spells do not require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

prerequisites: Earth Genasi, Fire Genasi, or Water Genasi
